#summary API

= API=

== Script name: `register.php` ==

POST Parameters:

  `userName` - alphanumeric string. Minimum and maximum length are defined in [InstallationInstructions#5._Customize_%27properties.ini%27_file properties.ini] file.

  `password` - alphanumeric string. Length 32 characters. It should be MD5 hash of user password obtained on client side.

  `eMailAddress` - string, syntactically valid e-mail address.

  `registrationCode` - alphanumeric string up to 10 characters long. It is needed only if it is defined so in `properties.ini` file.

Modified tables:
<div style="padding-left: 30px;">
<br /><span style="font-family: courier new;"><a href="https://www.blogger.com/2009/06/db-tables.html#TempInvitation">TempInvitation</a></span> - if new user has been invited by one of the existing users, or registration code is mandatory, entry containing e-mail address or registration code is deleted from this table.<br />  <br /><span style="font-family: courier new;"><a href="https://www.blogger.com/2009/06/db-tables.html#TempVerification">TempVerification</a></span> - new entry containing verification code is created if the parameter <span style="font-family: courier new;">SendVerificationEMail</span> in section <span style="font-family: courier new;">[General]</span> of file <span style="font-family: courier new;"><a href="https://www.blogger.com/2009/06/installation-instructions.html#properties.ini">properties.ini</a></span> is set to 1.<br /> <br /><span style="font-family: courier new;"><a href="https://www.blogger.com/2009/06/db-tables.html#User">User</a></span> - new entry is created.</div>
